1stLevelRangerSpells.Name: Alarm
1stLevelRangerSpells.Description: You set an alarm against unwanted intrusion. Choose a door, a window, or an area within range that is no larger than a 20-foot cube.

1stLevelRangerSpells.Name: Animal Friendship
1stLevelRangerSpells.Description: This spell lets you convince a beast that you mean it no harm. Choose a beast that you can see within range.

1stLevelRangerSpells.Name: Cure Wounds
1stLevelRangerSpells.Description: A creature you touch regains a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier.

1stLevelRangerSpells.Name: Detect Magic
1stLevelRangerSpells.Description: For the duration, you sense the presence of magic within 30 feet of you.

1stLevelRangerSpells.Name: Detect Poison and Disease
1stLevelRangerSpells.Description: For the duration, you can sense the presence and location of poisons, poisonous creatures, and diseases within 30 feet of you.

1stLevelRangerSpells.Name: Fog Cloud
1stLevelRangerSpells.Description: You create a 20-foot-radius sphere of fog centered on a point within range.

1stLevelRangerSpells.Name: Goodberry
1stLevelRangerSpells.Description: Up to ten berries appear in your hand and are infused with magic for the duration.

1stLevelRangerSpells.Name: Hunter's Mark
1stLevelRangerSpells.Description: You choose a creature you can see within range and mystically mark it as your quarry.

1stLevelRangerSpells.Name: Jump
1stLevelRangerSpells.Description: You touch a creature, and the creature's jump distance is tripled until the spell ends.

1stLevelRangerSpells.Name: Longstrider
1stLevelRangerSpells.Description: You touch a creature, and the target's speed increases by 10 feet until the spell ends.

1stLevelRangerSpells.Name: Speak with Animals
1stLevelRangerSpells.Description: You gain the ability to comprehend and verbally communicate with beasts for the duration.
